Reviews.Title: “very good value sydney hotel”
Reviews.Author: nudnick00
Reviews.Content: good location near uts.neat,modern suites at a very good value.free parking and breakfast.we were very happy with our stay

Reviews.Title: “lovely quaint hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ravens_Wallet1
Reviews.Content: We stayed for three days in this lovely quaint hotel and wished that we could have stayed longer. The rooftop swimming pool and BBQ were amazing. We loved this hotel. Hotels in Australia are not the same as in North America so don't go expecting the Hilton. However this hotel was Quirky and enjoyable to us.. Clean and well kept.

Reviews.Title: “nice,pleasant,value”
Reviews.Author: jamesromn
Reviews.Content: nice freiendly all suite accommodation in Sydney.modern,clean spacious suite with good size veranda and good kitchen.Free security car parking,free breakfast-good Sydney value accommodation

Reviews.Title: “friendly good value Sydney accommodation”
Reviews.Author: boony s
Reviews.Content: Friendly motel with very clean.nice and spacious hotel apartments (we stayed in a studio hotel apartment on the 4th level).It was the right location for us as it was close to the station and UTS.Very good value as it include breakfast & free car parking

Reviews.Title: “friendly and good hotel that met all our needs”
Reviews.Author: hutchinsign
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a week during the Sydney Mardi Gras. Yes, ok, the area is going through some regeneration, and there's little to do there locally, but we felt safe there and were actively going out and about both day and night. The hotel staff were excellent and extremely helpful, offering some great recommendations that enhanced our holiday. The apartment was clean and a good size - ours had been recently modernised and offered more value for money than expected. It was also well-equipped with a kitchen, washer and drier (which was utilised a fair bit). I slept on the sofa bed (comfortable enough for a sofa bed - and was clearly in its prime of life) whilst my friends had the proper bed. Air con in both the lounge and bedroom, and a patio that overlooked nothing of great interest but was useful extra space. The breakfasts (which were included) helped set us up for that day (toast, cerials, fruit, yogurt, tea, coffee). It felt like we were staying in a self catering apartment with the added bonus of a breakfast and staff until 7pm-ish during weekdays, earlier at the weekends. If you're wanting somewhere that's good value, close to great transport links (10 min walk to Central Station, major bus stops and the tram), clean, friendly with breakfast included, and not bothered about being a tiny bit off the beat and track, then this is well worth booking. The money we saved booking here was well used doing exciting things in the city (which was SO expensive!) I'd happily stay here again. TIP: as beach_buoy said, the three of us got better value getting a taxi to the airport than the train. Also, lots of taxi drivers were unsure where the hotel was located, if you're getting a taxi to the hotel it's worth making a note of the main roads that it sits next to to make sure you have a straightforward journey back.

Reviews.Title: “Good apartment in a rundown location”
Reviews.Author: rspatrick1107
Reviews.Content: As soon as we pulled up to the property we knew we had made a bad choice. The area is very run down & we did not feel safe to go out @ night, the hotel exterior is in a poor state of repair & it's sign has letters missing. The reception is only manned for part of the day & they bail out, which feels as though the guests are left to fend for themselves. On the plus side for Sydney this accommodation is relatively cheap & does include secure parking + the apartment itself was clean, well equipped & the staff were friendly enough + you also got a light breakfast That said I would not recommend this hotel as we did not feel @ ease walking about in this location, definitely not for the tourist.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, friendly and convenient”
Reviews.Author: Bronzewing50
Reviews.Content: Comfortable accomodation in a very convenient location, with parking included in the price, for a very good price.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel - excellent staff!”
Reviews.Author: beach_buoy
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 3 nights over New years eve. The rooms are of a good standard with all the facilities you need. The hotel is located about 10 mins walk to central tube station and takes about 10 minutes and costs between $10 - $15 in a taxi to get to the rocks/opera house area. The staff are what made our stay though they were all very helpful with anything we wanted. Only negatives were that gym and pool were both out of action during our stay and the area that the hotel is in is very quiet with not much going on. Would recommend though if you are looking for somewhere to stay in Sydney. TIP: It was cheaper to get a Taxi to the airport from the hotel than it was to catch the train to central and walk to the hotel - would imagine this depends on what time of day you are travelling though.

Reviews.Title: “nice friendly accommodation”
Reviews.Author: noel k
Reviews.Content: Nice friendly accommodation in Sydney.The location was great for us as we were visting the University in Broadway area.Very clean,spacious accommodation with both kitchen, laundry and free car parking and breakfast daily. Very good onsite management and great value for Sydney accommodation

Reviews.Title: “Substance over style, Function over form”
Reviews.Author: pamarx200
Reviews.Content: The Waldorf is not luxurious, but not cheap either, and not that well-situated and not that exceptional by any hotel rating system, but it worked for me. One by one: not luxurious, but a very functional room with kitchenette, bathroom, washer/dryer, balcony, closet space, cable TV and a comfortable bed. The management thought of everything: dishwashing soap, sponges, dishtowels, utensils and dishes, laundry detergent and chairs and table on the balcony. The apartment is also well-designed, with the kitchen by the balcony for ventilation, rather than by the entrance. As for the location: it is a good 10 minute walk to the main road (Broadway) or Central station, and the surrounding streets are deserted at night; on the other hand, the area seems more residential than unsafe. Now for the ratings climbing: the Waldorf has a few extras that might boost up its ratings. It serves breakfast in its cafÃ©. It has a (tiny) swimming pool and â€œspaâ€� (chairs) on its roof. It has a fitness room (closed for renovation). It has an elevator and in-building parking. But honestly, anyone seeking out the Waldorf for these amenities is better off elsewhere. The reason to come here is for the solid basics, fully functional apartments, and acceptable price (for Sydney). And the reception is friendly. In short, itâ€™s totally workable so long as you keep your expectations in check.

Reviews.Title: “It's good, but not sure of the location”
Reviews.Author: tommypee1
Reviews.Content: When you arrive, you will notice the great hospitality that exists in this hotel. Room is spacious with great and there is everything you need. It's all modern and clean. We stayed three nights and towels were changed twice. Bed wasn't made at all. So the service lacks a little bit. Breakfast was suprisingly good, they say that it's "light breakfast" but it's actually a pretty regular hotel breakfast. Highlight of this hotel is the rooftop. You can find a medium sized pool and a jacuzzi. The location. It's like 10 minute walk from Central station and 20 minutes to CBD. There is no bus stops nearby and there is just a few restaurants within walking distance. So, if you are not travelling with car - I don't recommend this hotel. But, if you don't need public transportation - this is the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great hosts, great rooms”
Reviews.Author: aptlearning
Reviews.Content: We decided to stay at the Waldorf Apartments in South Sydney on our way south to Melbourne due to it's location and price, as well as most recommendations on TripAdvisor. We were so glad we did that we returned on our way back to QLD as well. The location is fantastic with only a 10 minute walk to Central Station, and 15 to Darling Harbour. With two boys 13 and 10 the sofa couch proved fine and the 1 bedroom apartment is plenty big enough for the amount of time we spent in it. Hosts Pam and John are excellent, always friendly and interested in their clients. With the complimentary car parking and breakfast -with plenty of choice - I would say this is the best place to stay in Sydney of this genre. Will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great facilities”
Reviews.Author: Janet B
Reviews.Content: Very simple out of hours check in and parking. Pool on the roof and jacuzzi. The room had everything we needed. Got the washing done as the bathroom has a washer, dryer, ironing board and iron. Really comfortable bed, so had a good sleep. Kitchen with everything you could possibly need. They even leave you a little carton of milk for your tea and coffee. Got in to Circular Quay fron Redfern station that is just around the corner from the apartment in no time at all. Great! Couldn't fault it.

Reviews.Title: “very pleasant and friendly stay”
Reviews.Author: stevencorr
Reviews.Content: Early Nov 2011 we enjoyed a weeks stay at South Sydney Waldorf Apartments travelling from Brisbane, we found the hotel clean and the staff very friendly. The apartment we had was very quite and the beds comfortable, good kitchen & internal laundry facilities.It is an ideal location as it's close to the city, Broadway area and markets also transport, we would be more than happy to recommend it to family and friends and will stay there again when next visiting Sydney. It was good value as the rate include free breakfast & security car parking.

Reviews.Title: “Great Space for a Great Price”
Reviews.Author: McGintys
Reviews.Content: This is a great space for the price we paid. Only five minutes walk to Central Station and conveniency store two minutes away. Balcony with table and chairs [view is non-existant] but nice to have that extra space and fresh air if wanted. Good sized kitchen with w/machine, fridge, kettle, toaster and usual accessories for a kitchen. Good sized tv with extra fold out lounge and very comfortable queen bed. Air conditioning worked well. Carpets and walls were clean and unmarked. No problems with the elevator and hallways were tastefully decorated. Parking is also included in the price [which sometimes doesn't happen in inner city accommodation]. Continental breakfast is also included and more than adequate. Staff were very helpful at reception when checking in and checked that everything was fine when we left. There is also a rooftop pool, spa, gym and BBQ which was great. Plenty of space up there to relax and get some sun if you want. All in all a very and comfortable stay. As we were on the first floor the only slight draw back was some traffic noise from street below but it wasn't continuos - had a lot worse in other places and paid a lot more for it!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and basic”
Reviews.Author: Devin H
Reviews.Content: I was there for one night only just after I had arrived from my 14 hour flight. So all I needed was a place to lay my head and pass out from jet lag. My original room was rented out so I got upgraded at no charge. The room was surprisingly big and included a kitchen for use. Shower was enjoyable since the shower head was higher pressure than I expected. Everything was clean, and the location was very convenient for access to a number of things (the Central Train station is a 10 minute walk away). A few things that threw me off: - the gym was under renovation and wasn't available for use. - reception closed at 5 PM which seemed really early to me. And when I left the next morning, no one was there either.

Reviews.Title: “good value not facny but cleanand pleasant”
Reviews.Author: balog77
Reviews.Content: This accommodation is excellently located and incredibly handy to the University & Centralsation and include what this part of the city has to offer, which is an enormous amount of wonderful food and entertainment venues.There is no faulting the location, period. The studioapartment was nicely decorated , the bed is ok, the linen is clean, a good sized flat screen, small bathroom with laundry , but there is an overall sense that the room is spacious..The apartment had no noise . ....The restaurant downstairs provide free light breakfast which is great and is a pretty comfy place to laze around before venturing out.Free parking-in allgreat value for Sydney accommodation *

Reviews.Title: “basic but amazing value!”
Reviews.Author: saritgggg
Reviews.Content: I have stayed a 3 times and have been happy every time. I stayed in a studio service apartment plus balcony room for the 1st time and was very pleased. Excellent friendly ,staff on the desk .Great value which include free car parking ,breakfast & internet Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “bargain in the city”
Reviews.Author: 23belinda23
Reviews.Content: we stayed 2 nights in a 1 bedroom hotel apartment in Waldorf south Sydney.very clean modern accommodation.bargain for $145 per night which include free breakfasts for 3,free parking and internet-bargin in the city!!!

Reviews.Title: “good friendly accommodation”
Reviews.Author: 55522Sardine
Reviews.Content: Hotel is located just on the city fringe which suited me. The studio hotel apartment are very clean and the price is right. We got free parking & breakfast daily included in the rate.I booked on their own website and it saved me a few $$. .The service and smiles from the check in staff is something i have not experienced in a hotel since the 60s. They even remembered my name as i walked by on the last day of our stay. They have won business and word of mouth.

Reviews.Title: “Great value accommodation in Sydney”
Reviews.Author: gracesar
Reviews.Content: Very central location near the main railway station and Broadway area. We stayed for 6 nights in a spacious studio hotel apartment with full kitchen laundry and nice balcony. Very polite and helpfull management, great value as we got free breakfast and parking.Great place to stay at a very reasonable rate.I also like the rooftop and spent some time there! Recommended by us!

Reviews.Title: “we will never go back”
Reviews.Author: chien47
Reviews.Content: The only thing this hotel has in its favor is its location. Young people may not be concerned by cleanliness, but I think that they would even draw the line at thin, stained, torn strap mattress protectors and every pillow in the room old and thin, with the protectors filthy yellow and sweat stained ( we had to sleep without any). In addition to this the flushing button on the toilet cistern was not working properly, the bathroom floor was dirty and had obviously not been washed in a long time, toast crumbs and something sticky were all over the bench tops, the microwave oven was dirty inside and worst of all was the over powering " public loo" smell of cleaning disinfectant which someone had sprayed full strength in the kitchen and bathroom waste bins. You couldn't breathe properly, (anyone with asthma could not have stayed here). I wished we hadn't. We have stayed in many places throughout the world and have never complained about a room before, BUT, I HAVE STAYED IN COUNTRY MOTELS BETTER THAN THIS. We stayed here because we had previously stayed at the WALDORF at PENNANT HILLS and found it to be nothing like Sydney South. After making an official complaint to management, I won't be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great value for Sydney accommodation”
Reviews.Author: taradavis
Reviews.Content: Great value for Sydney aaccommodation.We had a spacious 1 bedroom apartment, clean modern with free breakfast & parking- great location and value for Sydney

Reviews.Title: “Great location for UTS”
Reviews.Author: baron6666
Reviews.Content: Spent a week in \South Sydney Waldorf while attending training in UTS. Greal location walk to UTS very god value,spacious , clean studio apartment free breakfast & parking

Reviews.Title: “great value in Sydney”
Reviews.Author: sarrydianne
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were booked into this apartment hotel whilst on buisness trip and family visit . It suited our purpose perfectly! We had 2 seperate stays of 2-3 nights each and were in different apartment in each stay Our hotel apartments were both Studio apartments and were clean and bright. .As well as a comfortable queen bed there was an en-suite bathroom with a laundry.It was clean, a kitchenette (microwave, dishwasher,fridge, kettle, toaster cuttlery etc. and sink . and a laundry (Washer, dryer, .ironing board and iron!) . Although overlooking a small lane (Dale Street) the noise did not affect our saty . .We had a nice balcony overlooking Lane Street and windows on the opposite wall . Street noise was virtually non existent in this room. . The apartment had TV with basic Foxtel channels, a good and chaep internet service,efficient and quiet A/C. The hotel is located in a central loaction with a rooftop swimming pool and seating. The There is a small gym comprised of a running and cycling machine and some weights. There is a restaurant which serves free breakfast and we had free car parking.Abercrombie St. . The location is perfect if you don't want to be in the centre of the city but still close enough to it to make visiting easy (you can be in the centre of the city after a 30minute walk). The staff were all friendly and helpful. the rate was a bargain for Sydney! . . .

Reviews.Title: “great find in Sydney”
Reviews.Author: balog99
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in Waldorf South Sydney for 3 night in May 2011.The location was great new the University where I had to attend meetings. Very pleasant,clean accommodation with full kitchen,laubdry and nice veranda.Free car parking and light breakfast- great value for buisiness travel in Sydney

Reviews.Title: “Very good value in Sydney”
Reviews.Author: talitu
Reviews.Content: Stayed here our last night in Sydney upon return from Cairns - departing to US the next day. Location was good to get to airport relatively quickly but neighborhood was only ok. Tough getting a taxi to go downtown. Room was quite large with kitchenette. Bed was ok. Staff at front desk was extremely helpful. Pool on roof was of no use due to weather and hot tub was not hot. Good price and very good value.

Reviews.Title: “Great value in Sydney”
Reviews.Author: chansandy88
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a spacious,clean,modern 1 bedroom hotel apartment in South Sydney Waldorf Apartments Hotel in Chippendale.area of Sydney.. Very good location8 minutes walk to the City Center,The Central Rail way station, Broadway and other local attractions. Our apartment was very modern and nicely equipped to accommodate all three of us.Great value as we had free light breakfast & parking.Great place to stay in Sydney if you are looking for great value and good hospitality from the hotel mamangement

Reviews.Title: “Great value for young family”
Reviews.Author: Hanoimum
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Waldorf for one night and after doing a lot of searching we decided that for the price and proximity to the airport and the city this was a good deal. The one-bedroom apartment was well equipped and we could actually cook our dinner in the kitchen (many places with kitchens fail to supply the basic equipment needed but this was definitely not the case here). The room was big enough to house a family of 5 albeit a bit squishy. There was a balcony to sit out on; secure parking included in the cost; a light breakfast and the staff were very helpful and keen to make sure we enjoyed our stay. We would definitely stay here again and for longer next time as we had access to the city and Darling harbor and the room provided washing machine/dryer which was a welcome bonus! Quiet location, leafy neighborhood with good range of shops and amenities all close at hand. Great stay. We'll be back at this price.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, clean and value for money!”
Reviews.Author: andy_scott1312
Reviews.Content: We landed pretty early in Sydney and after a short walk to the hotel, the manager and his wife couldnt have been more helpful. They got our room ready for us sooner than expected, and helped us with a map of the area, places of interest, places to eat, and travel info, all within the first few hours of us being there. They couldnt do enough!! Food was basic yet relaxed. Rooms were well equipped and very comfy. We stayed on the first floor, and were not disturbed once. Overall, the place was great, and the staff couldnt do enough for us and made the trip for us. At the end of the day, we used it as a base, so we could explore Sydney, but when we were in the room, we felt safe, comfy, and close enough to the sights. Catch the train to/from Redfern rather than Central, as this will safe you a 10 minute walk being closer to the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD BUISNESS ACCOMMODATION”
Reviews.Author: garsitn
Reviews.Content: Thank you for very good attitude and help during our 2 night stay in Waldorf South Sydney.We loved our 1 bedroom apartment,the location was great,the value very good .we will be back with you.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLANT”
Reviews.Author: ToniBee
Reviews.Content: We only stayed here for one night as it is close and handy to Concert Venues at Moore Park andThe Enmore Theatre. We found the place very easily, and were very happy with our 2nd floor one bed apartment costing $145 for 1Night (Room 204) We had a small kitchen area which we never used, shower and laundery facilities, a lovely queen size bed which was VERY COMFORTABLE, anda great little verander where we could sitout and have a smoke. We would also say that parking under the motel was good and secure, andwethought there was ample parking under the building, we certainly never had any difficulty getting a parking spot in the hotel parking area. We did not use the pool or gym, but were overall very happy with our stay here and would happily come back and stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Very good value in Sydney”
Reviews.Author: lim8888
Reviews.Content: We loved our studio South Sydney Waldorf apartment in which we stayed for a week in September 10, Our apartment was spacious with great kitchen,laundry and we loved the views from the veranda. This is a boutique complex with very good on site management and security.We stayed based on a special weekly rate which was very attractive- very great value in the central of Sydney- free parking and free light breakfast daily

Reviews.Title: “good basic motel”
Reviews.Author: k27672
Reviews.Content: we recently stayed here for 2 nights, I had read reviews before booking, but we were left somewhat let down by our stay compared to others. Here is my honest review; we booked here as we were in Sydney at the same time as a major event so other accom prices were through the roof. The units are located on a very busy road & the windows are not at all sound proof, luckily we had asked for a room away from street traffic noise, but even being on the 3rd floor and at the end of the building traffic noise inside room was still really loud. The units are good if you just want the basics & nothing extra. The bed was not that comfortable, we have slept on better. The bathroom was very very basic, the shower was really small you would not want to be over 6ft tall or you would not fit. The rooms are basic, the kitchen facilities are good but don't expect to be able to cook up a meal as untensils & cooking equipment is minimum. The roof top pool area was poorly maintained as there were tiles that were loose & unsafe, the BBQ's area rusted out & I wouldn't like to cook on them. The fencing aroung the roof top area is at a very unsafe height & can easy climbed over to fall to street below. The Gynasium is very poor, not at all what they advertise. Car parking is a bit of a joke as they advertise free parking but they only have about 5 spare spaces so make sure you get in quick. The people checking in after us missed out on parking & when they questioned this at reception, the staff acted as if they were surprised by the actual lack of amount of parking. Overall the location is quite good to the Broadway district, but is a bit of a hike to get to Darling Harbour. To top it all off after getting back to our rooms after a long day at sporting championships our room had not even been serviced, beds not made, bathroom not cleaned & towels not replaced. After a long day competing one of the thing syou lookforward to is a bed that has been made, considering you are paying a price for it, unfortunatley we didn't know when we booked that the rooms don't get serviced. The Rooms are ok, but nothing reallt they are nothing special. On Wotif they are self rated as 4 star I would rate them as a 3 star at best.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: NeerajVic
Reviews.Content: It was very wonderful experience to stay in this apartment with my family.Rooms are great and in room services are very good.Great city location and good Indian restaurants around.Staff is friendly.It had swimming pool on the terrace which was lovely.

Reviews.Title: “Some Reviewers Have 'Bagged' This Hotel - I'm Not One of Them”
Reviews.Author: Fwombats
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel before I read the reviews as it was close to a Sydney Uni function I was attending. Then read the reviews and while most were favourable, there were some that seemed to loath the place. I guess each review is only a snapshot and we all expect dufferent things from our teavel stays. I found my stay enjoyable all up. Arrivied to find that I'd been upgraded to a 1 bedroom unit from a Studio unit, which was a pleasant suprise. The room was spacious and clean, with a washing machine and dryer, which I put to use as my motorcycling cloths had done the whole 'wet' to 'sweat' route on my trip. Especially liked the secure parking - motorcycles seem a tempting target for thieves. If I was going to get picky, a scrubbing brush could have been used to get the dirty from around the base of the shower stall on the outside, but I've seen the same in other hotels that cost more and often deliver the same or less. I have no problem with the room not being serviced each day. I don't change my sheets and towels each day at home either, but I suppose I could have washed them and put them through the dryer if I had wanted! There are at least 3 restaurants within a few minutes walk in Cleavland St. The delights of Broadway and King St Newtown are only a 20 to 30 minute walk away. The staff were friendly and the breakfast simple but adequate. I see no reason not to return on another trip to Sydney.

Reviews.Title: “Great location near UTS”
Reviews.Author: sagiv0000
Reviews.Content: I visit UTS frequently and usually stay for 2-4 nights in Waldorf South Sydney. It a good deal for me as the operation provides free car parking,good internet service and free light breakfast daily. The rate are quite good and the apartment is spacious and fully equipped inclusive of linen,kitchen & internal laundry. Quite good value in Sydney

Reviews.Title: “Great location near central station & UTS”
Reviews.Author: 60713Sassin
Reviews.Content: I attended a 8 days course in UTS and stayed in Waldorf South Sydney serviced apartments. In addition to the obvious location benefit I found the fully furnished apartment very spacious,clean with great kitchen & laundary facilities. Great veranda and very good high speed internet service.Good onsite management as well as very good bargain rate for Sydney accommodation which included free parkung & breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Godd value for money in a good location”
Reviews.Author: clegg0000
Reviews.Content: Spacious 1 bedroom hotel apartment in a central location near the airport and Sydney Central railway station. Fully equipped accommodation, spacious, clean with nice kitchen,veranda and good internet service. Great value for business person, free security car parking and free light breakfast included

Reviews.Title: “Great Sydney budget accommodation”
Reviews.Author: lediakorr
Reviews.Content: Great value for accommodation ,free breakfast & parking. Very good location near the central railway station. Clean ,spacious hotel apartment with internet and telphone.Great value for money

Reviews.Title: “Great location very good value”
Reviews.Author: gour00
Reviews.Content: I visit Sydney Central quite frequently and stayed in South Sydney Waldorf for 6 nights for the first time.Very good location near the central railway and bus terminal, near Broadway and close to Sydney airport. The apartment was basic but modern, clean and nicely furnished and fitted and include kitchen,laundry and a veranda. Good internet service, free parking and free light breakfast daily. Great value for business person who does not require 6 star service but like spacious accommodation which enable working at the room.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and quality for a budget accommodation in Sydney”
Reviews.Author: dugbaron
Reviews.Content: stayed at the Waldorf for 7 nights in a studio hotel apartment. was happy with the choice. The apartment was clean and well equipped and furnished including washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, full kitchen facility and a very comfortable queen size bed. It took me only a few minutes to walk into the CBD, Broadway, Sydney Central railway station etc. The staff were polite and helpful. The complex has good security too and free parking. The apartment was much better than a hotel room - space to move and freedom to work after hours. The internet cost me only $15 dollars for the total stay for access and surfing the web, accessing emails . We got free breakfast for two.Great value in a very good location.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Breffni054
Reviews.Content: Very suitable for solo travellers due to excellent security. Lovely spacious apartments. Late arriving first night and milk and tea/coffee left in fridge. Staff more than helpful at all times. Continental breakfast available each morning. Balcony for smokers and ash tray provided...a necessity forgotten about nowadays. Facilitied in apartment first class from washer dryer and fridge freezer to cable TV. Leisure facilities free to guests. Very impressive security system for entry and exit. Well worth a visit.

Reviews.Title: “Very good location great value”
Reviews.Author: darig00
Reviews.Content: greta value in good Sydney location. sapcious clean, well look after serviced apartment at great rate which include car parking & free light breakfast.Nearthe central Sydney railway station.

Reviews.Title: “This Hotel Has Everything you would need if on a budget - A+++++”
Reviews.Author: madetodance
Reviews.Content: We were travelling on a tight budget and this hotel fitted the bill perfectly! It had everything we needed - kitchenette with dishwasher, microwave, stove, cooking implements, electric jug, toaster. Also a washing machine & dryer, hairdryer - there were even the small items that make life easier, like tissues, dishwashing liquid, teabags, milk. The balcony was a good size for sitting outside, the roof/bbq area/pool were absolutely fantastic!!! The walls must be very solid as there were no sounds from other rooms, although I think the hotel was solidly booked. Breakfast was great - certainly all that we needed. Nancy on the front desk was very helpful, as was the Manager. This is not pretending to be a 5 star hotel and I'm sure if you wanted to be picky you could find faults but we were happy and comfortable and I have stayed in FAR worse when travelling on a budget. We will definitely stay there again if and when we return to Sydney.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value, limited service”
Reviews.Author: bell0000
Reviews.Content: Good location for business travel to Sydney. Clean fully equipped and spacious hotel apartment if you do not like small hotel room. Limited service operation but great value with free carparking & light breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “Great location & value clean basic accommodation”
Reviews.Author: jasmin9999
Reviews.Content: Very good location and great value for budget travel. The apartment was clean,spacious, fully furnished. Basic fitout but satisfactory as it is clean, have full kitchen, laundry, good internet and nice verada. Very suitablefor extended stay and people who look for good value in Sydney.Parking is free and you have light free breakfast for two

Reviews.Title: “ABSOLUTE HOLE, STAY AWAY”
Reviews.Author: familygettaway
Reviews.Content: The room was bareable, the shower was mouldier than food that had grown legs in the fridge and walked out. The night manager was nastier than a rabid dog. Stay in a youth hostel....couldn't be worse than this place.

Reviews.Title: “Top Value for Money, Close to Rail/Bus Hub and has Secure Car Parking”
Reviews.Author: ozbozos
Reviews.Content: We vist Sydney at least once a year usually for about a week and have stayed in this aprtment/hotel about 5 times now. The location is superb, being 5 mins walk from Central Railway Station with its attendant buses. Chinatown is 5 mins walk as well. We use the studio apartment, where you can save money and time by preparing meals in the kitchenette, and also use the fully equipped laundry. Our rooms have always been scrupulously cleaned, and if some rooms had a couple of scuff marks from baggage they didn't bother us. The room are spacious and comforatble, and the balconies big enough to sit at and relax in the fesh air.There are no scenic views as such. With breakfast and underground parking included this place represrents terrific value for money. It is NOT 5 star, nor is it in a 5 star location visually. However for the traveller on a budget who wants easy access to transport facilities, as well as plenty of inhouse facilities such as kitchenette and own laundry we think this place is hard to beat. We didn't use the pool or BBQ, so can't comment on them. We will certainly continue to stay there when visiting Sydney, even if just for a day or two..

Reviews.Title: “Good location and value”
Reviews.Author: glensatir
Reviews.Content: Stayed for a week in South Sydney Waldorf apartmentsin Chippendale. Good location, near the central railway station, Broadway and my work area. The partment was clean well looked after with kitchen, laundry & veranda for smoking. I had free car parking & breakfast- very good value.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious ,clean accommodation in Sydney- good value”
Reviews.Author: macree8888
Reviews.Content: My studio hotwel apartment in South Sydney Waldorf was spacious, clean with veranda, kitchen & laundry and very cheap internet service. The apartment location was very suiotable as I was training in UTS and used to walk daily to my training. We had free car parking & free light breakfast and the apartment was serviced every 3-4 dyas. Very reasoable rate for Sydney accommodation

Reviews.Title: “Great value& niceapartment”
Reviews.Author: kagan7777
Reviews.Content: We spent a week in a 1 bedroom hotel apartment at the Waldorf South Sydney and were pleasantly pleased with the accommodation. The apartment was quite spacey queen bed,sofa bedin the lounge, nice kitchen that included dishwasher and microwave/oven and small dining table. The additional bonus was having a washing machine and dryer in the bathroom .as we had flown in from having a beach stopover in Thailand. There is also a spacious balcony which has a table and 2 chairs and on the roof top there is a pool .as well as BBQ facilities. The location is good- a 5minute walk to Central station and Broadway areas which will allow you to get almost anywhere in Sydney and a 15minute walk to Darling Harbour. . there is also onsite parking which I believe was free of charge. The freeBreakfast was basic but sufficient you get some cereal, toast, juice and tea/coffee which is enough. .. The apartment f was quiet although not sure if your room faces the . road, and the area around felt safe to walk around late at night. Staff are friendly and helpful.It was godd value for our money

Reviews.Title: “Filthy - never again”
Reviews.Author: Kroppers
Reviews.Content: After my daughter being on the floor of the apartment only 30 mins her knees and feet were near black. Insufficient amount of towels in the room, had to make three trips down to reception to get additional ones. Also insufficient bedding for a baby cot. Hair and other mess in the fold out sofa bed. No secure car space after 8pm. No one at reception after 7pm so could not address many of the issues that we had.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, great extended stay accommodation”
Reviews.Author: davis88
Reviews.Content: Great location, it took me about 8 minutes walking to UTS & broadway every morning- just left the car in the free carprking area. Spacious, basic but fully funished clean serviced apartrment with internal laundry, kitchen & good internet service. The free light breakfast is additional bonous. Very reasonable weekly rate- great for buisness travel extended stays!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not Recommended”
Reviews.Author: SydneyMarkMark
Reviews.Content: I booked for accommodation for 5 Â½ weeks thinking that this was good value for money, but I was mistaken. I received no customer service at all. Whilst some of the older ladies were nice and accommodating, the couple who managed the joint were appalling and unapproachable. They hardly smiled and showed no positive vibes. They had no negotiation skills and ran the hotel like dictators. The standard of cleanliness was poor. Linens were changed only when requested, and our room was cleaned only once a week. I had to request room amenities to be replaced each time they ran out. They did not live up to their name as a â€œserviced apartmentâ€�, as there was no service really provided!

Reviews.Title: “Great location , Value”
Reviews.Author: boxer8888
Reviews.Content: The location is great - a 7 minute walk to Central station and George St which will allow you to get almost anywhere in Sydney and a30 minute walk to Darling Harbour and other water front Sydney locations. if you hire a car there is also onsite parking which I believe was free .. Breakfast was ok you get some cereal, toast, juice and tea/coffee enough to get you going ours was built in to the price of the room but I think that may have been the case for all. The place itself was quiet and secured and the area around felt safe to walk around late at night. Staff are friendly and helpful. If you are looking for somewhere that has room service and 6 star hotel like facilities this is not for you. If you are looking for clean, fully equipped and value for money you are in the right place!They don't do housekeeping everyday unless you pay extra to have the service.The apartment is serviced weekly including linen & towls cahnge If you don't mind walking or having to travel in to the CBD / main sights or have a car and want somewhere clean and safe and home like this place is great. We will definitely like to use this place again.

Reviews.Title: “Confused by reviews for Liverpool location, this is chippendale.”
Reviews.Author: RocketmanAustralia
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the South Sydney Waldorf which is in Chippendale , but I nearly didn't based on the reviews, then I realised most of the bad ones were for the Liverpool Location. My experience was great, the location was perfect , close to the CBD and Universities (where I had to do business). My one bedroom apartment was great, clean and comfortable, the balcony was a nice space to have breakfast. I would recommend for people who need to access the city while wanting apartment style room. The Secure parking was terrific after a long day,just to come home and park instead of having to hunt for something and walk miles - a real bonus.

Reviews.Title: “Worst service I have EVER received. Unprofessional, unhelpful & incompetant.”
Reviews.Author: mili1234
Reviews.Content: I booked 3 apartments at this hotel for 12 ladies 2 weeks in advance. I gave my credit card details to secure the booking and even called back the next day to confirm. When we showed up on the day we were told to my complete horror, there was no booking in my name and they were fully booked out. They had no record of my booking and said they couldnt do anything. After numerous complaints they said they would look online and try to find us something else in another hotel. We had chosen this hotel due to close proximity of where we would be going out that night and due to good priced rooms. After 2 hours of waiting they came back with alternative accommodation 15 minutes away. We were told we would receive compensation for cab fares to the hotel, and out to where we would be going that night and back to the hotel. They said they would call me the next day. 2 weeks later after I had sent 2 complaint emails we had received no communication, no apology, and no compensation. The manager emailed me (couldnt be bothered to call me) and said that they found my booking booked 2 months away from the date I had actually booked and that it must have been my fault because the staff member couldnt have made the mistake. They also said the staff member remembered me talking about the date (2 months away) and mentioning it would be nicer weather. This was a blatant lie as I had not once mentioned the weather. They said they would not comensate us and that they were at no fault. Dont trust Waldorf, the service was unprofessional, unhelpful, incompetant and rude.

Reviews.Title: “Great base to see Sydney from”
Reviews.Author: rogers9999
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Sydney South waldorf for 14 nights. The location was great for us as a base to visit Sydney as non locals. Very nice, fully furnished spacious apartments accommodation with free car parking & light breakfast. Basic but secured apartment accommodation especially if you want to have more space than just a hotel room!

Reviews.Title: “If cheap is what you pay, then cheap is what you get”
Reviews.Author: averagejoe0
Reviews.Content: Very close to transport, easy walk to the city. 2 and half stars max. Dirty walls, chipped paint, bin wasn't emptied from previous guests. pool has stains and grime surrounding it, cheap and nasty all round.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious apartment hotel at good rate”
Reviews.Author: barlev_9
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Waldorf South Sydney for 5 weeks for buisness- the location was great walking to work. Very spacious hotel apartment, clean and secured with on site security car parking. good internet service and polite front desk- recomended

Reviews.Title: “Greta location for touring Sydney, spacious clean apartment for good value”
Reviews.Author: bannygadoon
Reviews.Content: We stay for a weeek in South Sydney Waldorf apartments. The three of us have a 1 bedroom apartment which was spacious, had kitchen,internal laundry, veranda and was fully furnished & equipped inclusive of internet. The apartment was clean and was serviced every few dyas by the staff. We had free car parking & free light breakfast. Central location ,walking distance to main railway station- Sydney Central - very reasonable rate!!!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: Charlie057
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for business reasons and was pleasantly surprised. As I frequently stay in hotels it was nice to have an apartment with all amenities included - even parking which was a bonus and was not charged extra for it. Convenient location.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, spacious rooms good value”
Reviews.Author: marybaron
Reviews.Content: I usually come to Sydney from NZ for 1-2 night and stay in standard hotel. This time I had to spend 3 weeks and rented a car so I have tried South Sydney Apartment Hotel. I got a spacious 1 bedroom apartment with a balcony & free security car parking. The complex is in a great location -near the area in Broadway that I worked for this period and I actually walked to work each day. The apartment was fully fitted & equipped with full kitchen & laudry and with high speed internet service at nominal weekly charge. The apartment was cleaned weekly which include linen change and the cleaning standard was good ( I am quite insisting in this area). The gym was closed- which was a pity but the pool on the roof was quite nice ( not Olympic size pool but ok). The complex is security complex and the reception staff ( which closed after 2200) was helpfull and polite. There was free light breakfast which taking into consideration that we are not in the Waldorf Astoria was good. Over all it is a place great for extended stay and travellers who seek good value ,clean and fully equipped accommodation of reasonable size rather than hotel room!!!. I did not like the decor in the room but I guess it is a matter of test. Will come back

Reviews.Title: “Like the location”
Reviews.Author: Aileen
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 5 nights. We had a car so the free parking and a bit of extra space was our main drawcards for staying here. The location suited us, easy walk to Central and Broadway Shopping Centre which had a good range of shops, movies and a great food court. The local pubs in the area represent good value for money and are friendly and welcoming. The staff at this hotel were very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was better than nothing. The room was adequate, my husband would of liked a tv in the bedroom. Bed was comfortable, kitchen good, it was great to have a washing machine and a balcony. While the room was clean other areas could of done with a bit of a spruce up. There was broken glass around the (dirty ) bbq which was there when we got there and still there when we left, which is not acceptable. I did not mention it to the staff but think someone should be looking over all public areas at least daily.

Reviews.Title: “Great spacious apartment, very good value”
Reviews.Author: Klackklack
Reviews.Content: We followed TripAdvisor and stayed 9 nights in South Sydney apartments. We found the apartment sapcious ,fully equipped & very clean with a good & cheap internet service. The free light breakfast was a nice suprise (we did not know about it!!!). The location was great- walking to UTS & Broadway and the free car parking was not used as we have returned our rental car. The onsite staff was very helpfull during our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, spacious apartment, good value”
Reviews.Author: rastas00
Reviews.Content: Have stayed for a week in February using the apartment for a base for our Sydney Holiday. The apartments are fully furnished & equipped with good internet service and weekly cleaning service. It was handy to have fee car bay and light breakfast as a free additional bonus.Used the kitchen for lunch & dinners. As we have all our kids with us the sofa bed in the lounge area was a reasonable solution. The pool and the rooftop garden were great the BBQ can be better looked at!

Reviews.Title: “Four Stars? Yeah right...two stars would be being generous!”
Reviews.Author: Leisha79
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Waldorf this past weekend and it was a terrible experience! There is no way this should be a four star hotel, two at the most! The room was dirty (other people's hair on the blankets...ewww), the toilet was cracked and ran constantly, there was no bathroom door, just some weird accordion style door...classy, the shower head was broken, the clothes dryer was broken, the carpet was dirty, the pool hadn't been cleaned since summer, hotel staff were rude (apart from one friendly guy working in the kitchen), this hotel is disgusting and I won't be staying anywhere near it ever again! Location was crap as well...15 minute walk to central, 30 minute walk to Darling Habour.

Reviews.Title: “Great Base, Especially If You Have a Car.”
Reviews.Author: jasonspaceman
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Waldorf apartments for 6 nights. We had a studio apartment on the 3rd floor. I called the hotel directly and got a rate of $125 per night, which was cheaper than was available online. The room itself was basic, but it had a washer/dryer/dishwasher and balcony. My only complaint about the room is that the bed was somewhat uncomfortable. It's fine for a week, but I wouldn't want to sleep on it for much longer than that. Also, the bathroom did not have an exhaust fan which was annoying. The location was great as we had a car. It is a 10 min walk to central station, but the area is quite and there were some shady characters hanging around late at night. By far the best aspect was the FREE onsite PARKING. Parking this close to the city costs a fortune everywhere else in Sydney. The apartment complex is a mix of apartments owned and operated by Waldorf and others which are privately owned. Although the Waldorf rooms are non smoking, the private residents are free to smoke. For the first few days our floor smelled quite strongly of cigarette smoke. I spoke with the desk and they offered to move us to another floor. They also called the other Waldorf guests on the floor and reminded them not to smoke. We were going to move, but after a call from the front desk the smoke was no longer a problem. The staff were very helpful and accommodating throughout our stay. The internet connection is dirt cheap. We were online several times each day and the bill at the end of our stay was under $10 (it's charged at 15c per MB). There is also a complementary breakfast. Overall I would definitely recommend the Waldorf South Sydney. For $125 per night with free parking and cheap internet, 10 mins walk from central station, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: “Ok if all you want is a base”
Reviews.Author: cardwellt
Reviews.Content: We rented a one bedroom apartment for two weeks. We arrived at 8.30am on the Monday morning and were pleasantly surprised to find our room was ready for us (officially check in was 2pm). Room was reasonably well equiped with dishwasher, washer drier safe etc. Our only niggles were that there were no coat hangers(!) and no clothes airer so you had to use the drier (seemed daft when temperature outside was in the mid 20s) Breakfast was sufficent - toast cereal and juice and was served from 7am till 10pm Monday to Sat and from 8am till 11am on Sunday and bank hollidays. We didn't come across any restaurants in the immediate location but it is only a short walk to the central/haymarkets area where there are loads of chinese restaurants, or if you walk down abercrombie street then turn left up broadway there are a few there (including a german restaurant and nandos), A little bit further up this road there is the broadway shopping centre. This is a new place so may not be on your map. This has a food court with a very good pizza/pasta place in it which is open late. Also in this shopping centre there is a large Coles supermarket, a K-mart and a cinema. Back to the accomodation - another slight niggle we had was that our room was not cleaned at all in the 2 weeks we were there. We saw the maids going round so not sure if this was just an oversight or not. However if you ask at reception they have spares of everything. We had no problems with noise on any night. All in all we were reasonably happy with the accomation for what we had paid. However we personally would probably pay slightly more and stay nearer to Circular Quay if we ever went back there,

Reviews.Title: “Great Place, Good People”
Reviews.Author: JosephBloggs
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Waldorf for 6 nights in a one-bedroom apartment. After checking out a lot of hotels on wotif.com, I was happy with the choice. The apartment was clean and well appointed including washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, full kitchen and a very comfortable bed. It took me only a few minutes to walk into the CBD, Opera House, Hyde Park etc. The staff were great and helpful. The building has good security too. The apartment was 100 percent better than a hotel room - space to move and freedom to entertain. The internet cost me all of $10 (i.e. $10 dollars for the total stay) for LAN access and surfing the web, accessing emails etc .

Reviews.Title: “Great Apt. Bad location”
Reviews.Author: debsimmonds
Reviews.Content: We rented a studio apt. It was well equipped, bright and comfortable. Complimentary breakfast was very nice as there were no eating establishments near by -- a problem for dinner when we didn't want to cook. Laundry in-room was wonderful. Staff was superb. As much as we like the facility, we didn't like the location. We were dependent on the train which was a long hike from the apartment. It's a 10 minute walk at a brisk, heart pumping pace. Also, many of the buildings between the apartments and the train station are abandon, with broken windows and rubbish. It made the walk a little scary. Perhaps once the college restarted in February, there would be more activity. I noticed some of the building looked like dorms and one eating establishment looked like it was preparing to reopen -- with the start of school.If you have a car, this would be a better location. It seems that Saturday night's are party night at the Waldorf. It was very noisy, people running and shouting through the halls, as well from the roof top pool area. With cement buildings next door, the sound reverberated and intensified. I don't know if people from the Y-Sydney (across the street) invade the property on Saturday night or what. We complained to the front desk at 1:30 am, but the party didn't wrap up until around 3 am. Needless, to say, it was a sleepless night which affected our next day of sightseeing. When I mentioned it to the staff the next morning, their "oh Saturday night" reaction lead me to believe that it happens every weekend.

HotelInfo.Name: South Sydney Waldorf Apartment Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 47 Chippen Street | Chippendale, Sydney, New South Wales 2008, Australia
